description.plain:
The Wild Reeds is an American alt-country/folk trio based in Los Angeles comprising Sharon Silva, Kinsey Lee, and Mackenzie Howe.

Though all three singers are also songwriters, they are seldom individually credited. The reason for this is addressed in this quote by Silva: “We’re vessels for the songs. We don’t claim ownership.”

The trio switches up instruments onstage – acoustic guitars, fuzzed-out electrics, harmonium, banjo, Nord keyboard, harmonica – and toured with other members on bass guitar and drums (Nick Phakpiseth and Nick Jones, respectively).
